title: Knowledge Base

document.title: Document Knowledge
document.noTeamHint: You haven't joined any teams yet. Create or join a team to view team knowledge bases here.
document.noGroupHint: You haven't joined any groups yet. Create or join a group to view group knowledge bases here.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.name: Name
knowledgeBase.nameTooLong: Name must be 100 characters or less
knowledgeBase.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge base? This action cannot be undone.
knowledgeBase.cannotDeleteWithDocuments: This knowledge base contains documents and cannot be deleted. Please delete all documents first.
knowledgeBase.deleteWarning: This knowledge base contains {{count}} document(s). Please delete all documents before deleting the knowledge base.

document.title: Documents
document.emptyHint: Upload your first document to get started
document.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
document.dropzone: Drop files here or click to browse
document.supportedTypes: PDF, Word, PPT, Excel, TXT, MD, Images (Max {{maxSize}}MB)

upload.dropzoneHint: Select up to {{max}} files at once
upload.pasteTextHint: Paste text content below to upload it as a document to the knowledge base.
upload.fileNamePlaceholder: Enter file name (optional, auto-generated by default)
upload.tableHint: Enter the table link and name to add it to your knowledge base.
upload.tableUrlHint: Please enter a valid table URL. Ensure the link is accessible and you have read permission. Currently supports DingTalk tables.
upload.tableAddFailed: Failed to add, please try again

validation.invalidUrlFormat: Please enter a valid URL format
validation.unsupportedProvider: Unsupported link source. Currently only DingTalk tables are supported
validation.parseFailed: Unable to parse the link. Please check if the URL format is correct
validation.missingDingtalkId: You do not have a DingTalk ID configured. Please log in using DingTalk to access table documents
validation.tableAccessFailed: Unable to access the table. Please check if you have access permissions
validation.tableAccessFailedLinkedTable: The table might be a linked table. Please use the original table link
validation.unknownError: Validation failed. Please check if the URL is correct
validation.networkError: Network error. Please try again later
validation.pleaseFixUrl: Please fix the URL before submitting

permission.noAccess: You do not have permission to perform this action

retrieval.noRetriever: No retriever available. Please configure one in Settings.
retrieval.noEmbeddingModel: No embedding model available. Please configure one in Settings.

splitter.title: Chunking Settings
splitter.overlapError: Overlap must be less than chunk size

summary.enableDescription: Generate summaries on upload to improve search and retrieval quality
summary.modelRequired: Please select a model for summary generation

retrievalTest.title: Retrieval Test
retrievalTest.description: Test knowledge retrieval effectiveness with a given query text.
retrievalTest.emptyHint: Retrieval test results will be displayed here
retrievalTest.noConfig: This knowledge base has no retriever or embedding model configured. Cannot perform retrieval test.
retrievalTest.error: Retrieval test failed, please try again
retrievalTest.configHint: These settings are for testing only and will not be saved to the database.

add_repository_desc_enabled: Click to add a new repository
cancel_dialog_description: Are you sure you want to cancel the wiki generation? This action cannot be undone.
select_content_hint: Choose a topic to view its documentation
access_denied_description: The wiki task user does not have access to this repository. Please add the user to the GitLab project or configure a different user.
no_bound_model_warning: Wiki generation is not available. The default wiki team does not have a model configured. Please contact administrator.

dingtalkTable.title: DingTalk Tables
dingtalkTable.emptyHint: Add DingTalk tables in your knowledge base to see them here

error.noAssistant: AI Assistant agent not found. Please ensure a team named 'AI助理' is configured in the system

table.title: Data Tables
table.emptyHint: Add data tables in your knowledge base to see them here

error.noAssistant: AI Assistant agent not found. Please ensure a team named 'AI助理' is configured in the system
